containingTextInBody(java.lang.String).Description: Returns a matcher that matches Documents that have a body containing the given test.

hasElementWithXpath(java.lang.String).Description: Returns a matcher that matches @B_org#w3c#dom#Document_E@s that have at least one element with the given xpath.

withTextContent(java.lang.String).Description: Returns a matcher that matches @B_org#w3c#dom#Element_E@s with the given textContent. Equivalent of withTextContent(is(textContent)).

hasElementWithId(java.lang.String).Description: Returns a matcher that matches @B_org#w3c#dom#Document_E@s that have at least one element with the given id.

ClassDesc: A collection of hamcrest matchers for objects in the org.w3c.dom package (such as https:##developer#android#com@B_org#w3c#dom#Document_E@ and https:##developer#android#com@B_org#w3c#dom#Element_E@).
